radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: Minimal atelectasis at the left lung base; tiny hypodense focus in the gallbladder; symmetrical enhancement of the kidneys; previously seen hypoenhancement of the right kidney no longer evident; no focal pyelonephritis or infarction; scattered diverticula throughout the sigmoid colon with one large acutely inflamed; liver with nodular heterogeneous appearance consistent with cirrhosis; splenomegaly; known thrombus within the anterior and posterior branches of the right portal vein; lymphadenopathy at porta hepatis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No focal pyelonephritis or infarction is identified on the current examination; previously seen hypoenhancement of the right kidney is no longer evident; previously seen possible thrombus within the central portion of the left portal vein is no longer evident.
